    • killDamageSource

      public static void killDamageSource(net.minecraft.entity.LivingEntity entity, net.minecraft.entity.damage.DamageSource source)
      Kills an entity from a damage source.

      It will not kill the entity if it is invulnerable to the damage source

    • fakeEntityFromId

      public static net.minecraft.entity.Entity fakeEntityFromId(int id)
      Creates a fake entity from an entity ID. This is NOT to be used in anything other than an entity id getter

      (For example), some packets require an entity, but virtual entities only have an id
